item.description:
This class combines SoulCollage®  with one of my previous classes on Discovering Your Goddess Archetype. Come for a fun and creative time of self-discovery and relaxation with images and a glue stick.  Take a "quiz" to learn which of the four Goddess Archetypes you most strongly resonate with: Lover, Mystic, Warrior or Queen.  Begin now to collect images that you think may depict one or more types.  Then come to class, search through a bunch of other images and Create one or more Goddess cards.  Judy will also give a mini-talk on how to maximize the Goddess Archetypes in your life. Handouts supplied. Or, you may create any cards you want, with any theme.  Cards are for your own use for inspiration, divination or reflection.  Honor your "shadows," accept your "archetypes" express your soul's longings, and muse forth your "moods"....all aspects of "YOU" are welcomed in the SoulCollage® process!

Go to www.AHigherBalance.com to see samples and learn about other upcoming programs.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B
item.why: SoulCollageÂ® - Special Goddess Class - extended hours, same rate Sunday, June 5, 12:30 - 4:15 ($30) ...call or email to let me know you are coming!
item.name: SoulCollage - Special Goddess class
